bibl.title: The Civil War between Ptolemy VIII and Cleopatra II: Possible Causes and Key Events
bibl.seg: Eddy Lanciers, The Civil War between Ptolemy VIII and Cleopatra II (132-124): Possible Causes and Key Events.

Gilles Gorre & Stéphanie Wackenier (edd.), Quand la fortune du royaume ne dépend pas de la vertu du prince: un renforcement de la monarchie lagide de Ptolémée VI à Ptolémée X (169-88 av. J.-C.)? = Studia Hellenistica. 59 (Leuven, 2020) pp. 21-54, figg.

Article inédit. - The outbreak of the civil war. - Possible causes for the civil war. - The era of Cleopatra II. - The territorial extent of the conflict. - The expulsion of Ptolemy VIII from Alexandria and his flight to Cyprus. - The king's return to Egypt and his recapture of Alexandria. - The reconciliation of the three rulers. - Conclusion.
